backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing deployment-related features, associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Mainnet deployment guide with prerequisites, build steps, commands, and URL verification instructions.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables defining light/dark color palettes and shared UI styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint loading fonts, metadata, and mounting the React application.
frontend/LIVE_URL.md: File intended to store the production deployment's stable HTTPS URL and verification notes.
frontend/scripts/deploy-mainnet.sh: Shell script that builds the frontend, deploys canisters to mainnet, and prints the resulting live URL.
frontend/scripts/verify-live-url.sh: Script that checks availability of the live URL and provides troubleshooting guidance based on HTTP status.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling personalization, presentation mode, yes/no flow, celebrations, and section rendering.
frontend/src/components/AmbientBackgroun: Renders a decorative background with floating hearts/sparkles when enabled.
frontend/src/components/AudioToggle.tsx: Button with tooltip that toggles background music using a custom audio hook.
frontend/src/components/CelebrationLayer: Generates falling heart particles for an on-screen celebration effect.
frontend/src/components/CopyLinkButton.t: Button that copies the current page URL using clipboard API with fallback and shows a tooltip and copied state.
frontend/src/components/PersonalizationP: Editable settings panel for customizing names, text, reasons, and memories using tabs and local storage state.
frontend/src/components/PresentationMode: Toggle button with tooltip to switch presentation mode on or off.
frontend/src/components/sections/LoveLet: Expandable card displaying a love letter that opens and closes with animations.
frontend/src/components/sections/MemoryT: Accordion-based timeline listing memories with titles, dates, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/sections/Reasons: Progressively reveals a list of reasons with cards and a button to show the next item.
frontend/src/components/YesNoPrompt.tsx: Yes/No prompt where the No button moves randomly and messages change while Yes triggers a callback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioPlayer.ts: Hook providing play, pause, and toggle controls for looping audio with load and play state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for Internet Identity login, identity management, and AuthClient setup.
Defines a personalization state hook that loads, saves, updates, and resets user customization data using localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides an empty placeholder module noting that all state is managed clientâ€‘side.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and a Valentine-themed color palette with custom utility classes and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, radii, shadows, and animations including Valentine-specific theme values.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature status, and deployment-related requirements for the Internet Computer app.
